description: Rules for enforcing reusable components instead of raw HTML elements

rules.name: No raw button elements
rules.message: Use <Button> or <IconButton> component from @/shared/ui instead of raw <button> elements

rules.name: No raw input elements
rules.message: Use reusable input components instead of raw <input> elements. Available components: Input, FormInput, AuthInput, SearchInput, PhoneInput, FileInput, Checkbox, Toggle
rules.suggestion: import { Input, FormInput, AuthInput, SearchInput, PhoneInput, FileInput, Checkbox, Toggle } from '@/shared/ui'

rules.name: No raw textarea elements
rules.message: Use <Textarea> or <AuthInput inputType='textarea'> component from @/shared/ui instead of raw <textarea> elements

rules.name: No raw select elements
rules.message: Use <Select>, <ApiDropdown>, or <UiDropdown> component from @/shared/ui instead of raw <select> elements

rules.name: Prefer Input component over FormInput
rules.message: Use Input, FormInput, or AuthInput components instead of raw <input> elements with type attributes
rules.suggestion: Available input components: Input (basic), FormInput (full-featured), AuthInput (auth pages), SearchInput (search), PhoneInput (phone numbers)

rules.name: Use Avatar component for user initials
rules.message: Use <Avatar> component for user avatars and initials

rules.name: No raw loading spinners
rules.message: Use <LoadingSpinner> or <LoadingOverlay> component

rules.name: Use Alert component for info/warning/error boxes
rules.message: Use <Alert> component for info/warning/error messages

rules.name: Use AddressFormGroup for address fields
rules.message: Use <AddressFormGroup> component instead of individual address fields

rules.name: No hardcoded primary color
rules.message: Use 'primary' design token instead of hardcoded #D417C8

rules.name: No hardcoded secondary color
rules.message: Use 'secondary' design token instead of hardcoded #14BDEA

rules.name: No hardcoded accent color
rules.message: Use 'accent' design token instead of hardcoded #7767DA

rules.name: No hardcoded success colors
rules.message: Use 'success' design token for success/active states

rules.name: No undocumented teal color
rules.message: Color #00BCD4 is not in design system. Use secondary instead.

rules.name: No undocumented blue color
rules.message: Color #32A1E4 is not in design system. Use secondary or accent instead.

rules.name: No custom padding in modal children
rules.message: Modal component provides padding. Remove custom p-6 from direct children.
rules.suggestion: Remove p-6 from modal content - Modal provides px-6 py-6 automatically

rules.name: No custom overflow in modal children
rules.message: Modal component handles overflow. Remove custom overflow/max-height.
rules.suggestion: Remove overflow and max-h classes - Modal handles scrolling automatically

rules.name: Enforce standard 36px height
rules.message: Use h-9 (36px) for standard inputs and buttons instead of h-10

rules.name: Use Combobox for form dropdowns
rules.message: Use Combobox, CountrySelect, or CurrencySelect instead of shadcn Select for form data selection. These provide consistent styling, search, clear, and keyboard navigation.
rules.suggestion: import { Combobox } from '@/shared/ui/Combobox' or import { CountrySelect } from '@/shared/ui/CountrySelect' or import { CurrencySelect } from '@/shared/ui/CurrencySelect'

rules.name: No Tailwind emerald color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'success' token instead of Tailwind emerald colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-emerald-* with text-success, bg-emerald-* with bg-success or bg-success/10, border-emerald-* with border-success

rules.name: No Tailwind blue color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'primary' or 'secondary' token instead of Tailwind blue colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-blue-* with text-primary or text-secondary, bg-blue-* with bg-primary/10 or bg-secondary/10

rules.name: No Tailwind red color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'destructive' token instead of Tailwind red colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-red-* with text-destructive, bg-red-* with bg-destructive or bg-destructive/10, border-red-* with border-destructive

rules.name: No Tailwind yellow/amber color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'warning' token instead of Tailwind yellow/amber colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-yellow-*/text-amber-* with text-warning, bg-yellow-*/bg-amber-* with bg-warning or bg-warning/10

rules.name: No Tailwind green color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'success' token instead of Tailwind green colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-green-* with text-success, bg-green-* with bg-success or bg-success/10

rules.name: No Tailwind purple/violet color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'accent' token instead of Tailwind purple/violet colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-purple-*/text-violet-* with text-accent, bg-purple-*/bg-violet-* with bg-accent or bg-accent/10

rules.name: No font-semibold in UI components
rules.message: Use font-medium instead of font-semibold. Maximum font weight in UI is 500 (font-medium).

rules.name: No font-bold in UI components
rules.message: Use font-medium instead of font-bold. Maximum font weight in UI is 500 (font-medium).

rules.name: No border-white in components
rules.message: Use semantic border-border or border-primary/20 instead of border-white
rules.suggestion: Replace border-white/* with border-border or border-primary/20

rules.name: Use gap-2 for button groups
rules.message: Use gap-2 for button groups instead of gap-3 for consistent spacing
rules.suggestion: Replace gap-3 with gap-2 in button group containers

rules.name: No text-white in UI components
rules.message: Use text-foreground instead of text-white for semantic color consistency

rules.name: No text-gray-* in UI components
rules.message: Use text-muted-foreground instead of text-gray-* for semantic color consistency

rules.name: No bg-gray-* in UI components
rules.message: Use bg-muted or bg-card instead of bg-gray-* for semantic color consistency
rules.suggestion: Replace bg-gray-* with bg-muted or bg-card

rules.name: No legacy text-fg token
rules.message: Use text-foreground instead of legacy text-fg token

rules.name: No legacy text-fg-muted token
rules.message: Use text-muted-foreground instead of legacy text-fg-muted token

rules.name: No hardcoded hex colors in className
rules.message: Use semantic color tokens instead of hardcoded hex colors in className
rules.suggestion: Replace with semantic tokens: text-primary, text-secondary, text-accent, etc.

rules.name: No Tailwind orange color classes
rules.message: Use semantic 'warning' token instead of Tailwind orange colors
rules.suggestion: Replace text-orange-* with text-warning, bg-orange-* with bg-warning or bg-warning/20, border-orange-* with border-warning
